description: This file is a shell script that manages the start, stop, and restart procedures for the libvirtd virtualization daemon. It includes functions for logging and checks for existing process IDs, utilizing system utilities like start-stop-daemon and conditional logging output.

methods.name: log_begin_msg
methods.description: Logs the beginning of a message, printing a formatted starting message.

methods.name: log_end_msg
methods.description: Logs the end of a process with success or failure indication.

methods.name: log_warning_msg
methods.description: Logs a warning message, optionally using fancy terminal output if supported.
